cards.title: Dragontamer
cards.powers: {Dragontamer} deals 1 target 1 Projectile damage. Increase damage dealt by Dragons to that target by 1 until the end of your next turn.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a Power now
Increase the damage dealt by Heroes by 1 until the start of your next turn

openingLines.BahamutCharacter: You can't just mutate people! I'm here to stop you!

cards.title: Drako
body: At the start of your turn, you may destroy a card under this. If you do, increase damage dealt by Drako until the start of your next turn.
powers: Drako deals 1 non-Hero target 2 Melee damage then 2 Fire damage.
cards.flavorReference: Label on Drako's Cage, Here Be Dragons #1

cards.title: Elgor
body: When {Elgor} deals damage to a Character card, he may destroy a card under him. If he does, he may destroy an Ongoing or Device in their play area.
cards.flavorReference: Label on Elgor's Cage, Here Be Dragons #1

cards.title: Hydra
body: Whenever Hydra deal Melee damage, you may destroy a card under this. If you do, Hydra deals that target 1 Fire Damage.
powers: Hydra deals up to 3 targets 1 Melee damage.
cards.flavorReference: Label on Hydra's Cage, Here Be Dragons #1

cards.title: Tortuga
body: When {Dragontamer} or a Dragon in play would be dealt damage, you may destroy a card under Tortuga to redirect that damage to Tortuga.
Reduce Damage dealt to Tortuga by 1.
powers: Reduce the damage dealt to Dragontamer and Dragons you control by 1 until the start of your next turn.
cards.flavorReference: Label on Tortuga's Cage, Here Be Dragons #1

cards.title: Jormungander
powers: Deal 1 target 2 Fire damage. If there are cards under this, you may destroy one and destroy an Environment card.
cards.flavorReference: Label on Jorg's Cage, Here Be Dragons #1

cards.title: Bite!
body: One Dragon deals 1 target 2 Melee Damage.
You may put this card under a dragon in play.

cards.title: Burn!
body: One Dragon deals up to 3 targets 1 Fire damage each.
You may put this card under a dragon in play.

cards.title: We Fight as One!
body: Use a power on a Dragon now.
You may put this card under a dragon in play.

cards.title: Healthy Treat
body: A dragon in play regains 2 HP, then put this card under it.
If there are no Dragons in play, you may search your trash for a Dragon and put it into play.

flavorQuotes.text: Someone once said an army{BR}marches on its stomach.{BR}I find it helps with dragons too.

cards.title: Protein Snack
body: Choose a Dragon.
Increase the next damage dealt by that dragon by 1, then put this card under it.
IF there are no dragons in play, you may search your trash for a Dragon and put it into play.

flavorQuotes.text: No! Stop eating the training carcass!

cards.title: Here Be Dragons!
body: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Dragon and put it into play. Shuffle the remaining cards back into your deck.
If no cards are played this way, search your trash for a Dragon and put it into play.
Then, you may play a Command card.

cards.title: On The Fly
body: Choose Dragon or Command.
Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a card with the chosen keyword and put it in your hand
You may play a Dragon or Command card.

flavorQuotes.text: We'll just have to make something up!

cards.title: Strategize
body: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Command cards. Put them in your hand.
If you revealed any dragons doing this, put one into your hand.
Shuffle the rest back into your deck

flavorQuotes.text: So here's the plan,{BR}are you listening Drako?

cards.title: Dragon Egg
body: When this card is destroyed, you may search your deck or trash for a Dragon and put it into play.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: I have a few backup plans,{BR}especially after Bahamut

cards.title: Active Training
body: You may use an additional Power on your Power phase.
At the start of your turn, you may put the top card of your deck under a Dragon in play.

flavorQuotes.text: Come on, you can do it!

cards.title: Learning Experience
body: When you use a power on a Dragon, you may draw a card.
Once per turn, when you draw a card, you may put a card in your hand under a Dragon.

flavorQuotes.text: You have to learn from every failure{BR}to overcome any obstacle

cards.title: Serum Applicator
body: Increase Projectile Damage dealt by {Dragontamer} by 1
powers: {Dragontamer} deals 1 target 2 Projectile Damage. Then a Dragon in play may deal that target 1 Melee Damage.

flavorQuotes.text: What once propogated Replic-8{BR}will now help stop it

promoCards.title: Dragontamer, Fully Evolved
promoCards.powers: Dragontamer deals 1 target X Melee damage, where X equals 2 plus the number of cards under this. Destroy all cards under Dragontamer.
incapacitatedAbilities: One Hero may use a Power now
One Hero may draw a card now

openingLines.default: I'll take you down with my own claws if I have to!
openingLines.BahamutCharacter: The very things you abandoned will stop you!
openingLines.ExWeaverCharacter: I won't let everything we've built come undone!
